column3: IMO sticking the script in the repo under contrib/meta (maint?) isn't a bad idea. A similar use for such a directory would be a script to update/dump the pnSeeds table.\n

we could do that, but I'd need a little TLC so it takes parameters (year, file extensions to check)... or maybe it just defaults to current year and .cpp and .h. (it was a quick and dirty thing)

I didn't want to suggest since I don't know how you guys feel about adding scripts in more languages, I'm not sure if python is being used already (didn't check)
Personally I'm fine with throwing the script in there as-is so long as its purpose is documented at the top of the script. A quick one or two line summary is fine.\n

I've fixed the script, however I don't see a contrib/meta folder, I see a contrib/devtools though which has an .sh script and a README. I could add it there and update the readme to explain how to use the script.\n

Ah, yeah, devtools looks right to me, put it there. I wouldn't bother with a separate README, just use a sane name for the script and put a line or two of comments saying what it is at the top of the script.\n
Ok, so rebased and pushed.\nThe script has a nice comment up top, and I've added github formatted documentation to the README.md that was on the devtools folder to keep things consistent.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/57702541a2009d4b936ebfddeeec3db7f8f74e5c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

@gubatron Next time please use an empty line between the title and the rest of the commit message. 

Otherwise tooling like `git log --abbrev-commit` shows the entire commit message instead of just the title:

```
| * 5770254 - Copyright header updates s/2013/2014 on files whose last git commit was done in 2014. contrib/devtools/fix-copyright-headers.py script to be able to perform this maint
